txt.en: In Red Dawn:\nIncreases the damage done by Call of the Cavalry by [placeholder].
Your cry rings out, persisting in the ears and minds of those unfortunate enough to have ridden near.
Each rank increases Max Speed by 1.0 mps.
In Rohirrim:\nIncreases healing done by Call of the Cavalry by [placeholder].\n
In Riddermark:\nIncreases the attack speed buff from Call of the Cavalry by [placeholder].\n
In Red Dawn:\nIncreases the damage done by Call of the Cavalry by [placeholder].
